participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and thoughtful, Margaret loves to engage in activities that challenge her comfort zone.
participant_1.background: My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things. To free my mind from feeling depressed, I look up at the stars at night. I enjoy spending my free time looking for interesting things to add to my collection. I've kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove. I lay awake at night so I can watch the stars.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Driven and curious, Ethan seeks to explore and expand his horizons in life.
participant_2.background: My first big purchase was my home. I realized that I have more control over my life than I thought I did. I'd love to be a pilot like my brother. I am passionate about a lot of things. I drink a cup of coffee and check my email before heading out the door.

content.text: I love looking up at the stars at night and it makes me feel free.
I do too! It is so peaceful and calming.
I love learning about the stars and all the different constellations.
Me too! I have always been fascinated by space and astronomy.
I would love to go on a stargazing trip some time.
That would be so much fun! I would love to see all the different stars and galaxies up close.
I would too! We should plan a trip soon.
Great! I will start looking into some places to go.
